backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing a gig economy platform with human worker and AI agent profiles, task management, payment processing via Stripe, access control, blob storage, push notifications, and admin dashboard statistics with 7% platform fee calculation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: MyProfile page at /perfil, Edit Profile/Stats Analytics buttons, public profile URLs at /perfil/[user-id], and updated navigation menu with 'MEU PERFIL' link.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, authentication flow, profile pages, dashboard, analytics, settings, legal pages, payment flows, hooks for backend queries and translations, and styling with Portuguese-inspired color palette.
frontend/.env.example: Environment configuration template with VITE_TEST_MODE flag to control test mode UI elements visibility in development versus production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining Portuguese-inspired warm earth tone color palette in OKLCH format for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Portuguese locale, SEO meta tags, PWA manifest, social media cards, Leaflet CSS for maps, and Google Fonts (Inter and Playfair Display).
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining CanisterTask as a standalone app with Portuguese locale, business/productivity categories, and 512x512 icon configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for dashboard, analytics, settings, legal pages, payment flows, admin, notifications, /perfil (MyProfile), and /perfil/$userId (PublicProfile), wrapped in ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age verification modal requiring users to confirm 18+ age with session persistence before rendering child components, preventing dismissal via outside clicks.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper component that displays a login screen for unauthenticated users and wraps authenticated content with AgeGate and ProfileSetup components. Shows loading states during initialization and login.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentStatus: Displays a status card showing three deployed mainnet canisters (main, escrow, stats) with their IDs and links to the Internet Computer network.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a fallback UI and reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, navigation links, legal information, and social media sharing buttons for WhatsApp, Twitter, Telegram, and LinkedIn.
frontend/src/components/GDPRConsent.tsx: Checkbox component for GDPR consent with links to privacy policy and terms of service.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with logo, navigation links, authentication controls, theme toggle, language selector, notification bell, and admin link for authorized users.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Notification bell icon with badge showing unread count and popover displaying unread notifications with mark-as-read functionality and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog that prompts new users to create a worker profile with default Évora location settings, shown when no user profile exists.
frontend/src/components/TaskHeatmap.tsx: React component that dynamically loads Leaflet and renders an interactive heatmap showing task density (active, completed, earnings) across Portugal regions (Évora and Lisboa) using mock location data.
frontend/src/components/TestModeStats.ts: Displays a card with test mode statistics (total tasks and earnings) using amber styling to indicate simulated data that doesn't affect real records.
frontend/src/config/features.ts: Feature flag configuration that controls test mode visibility via TEST_MODE_ENABLED, defaulting to true unless VITE_TEST_MODE environment variable is 'false'.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBrowserNotificatio: Hook for managing browser notification permissions and displaying notifications with click handlers that navigate to dashboard when task-related notifications are clicked.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking through React context and AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadingTimeout.ts: Simple hook that tracks whether a loading state has exceeded a configurable timeout (default 5 seconds) with reset capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching user profiles, dashboard stats, daily earnings, notifications, and admin status from the backend actor with automatic refetching and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestMode.ts: Hook that simulates task completion in test mode, calculating worker earnings and platform fees (7% fee, 93% to worker) while tracking accumulated statistics.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Internationalization hook providing Portuguese and English translations for UI strings across authentication, profile, navigation, dashboard, analytics, settings, and admin sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using HSL values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying platform information with three cards explaining the decentralized ICP-based gig economy platform, secure escrow payments, and EU/PT GDPR compliance.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard showing platform statistics, daily earnings charts, task metrics, and date-filtered analytics with refresh functionality. Includes access control check and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics page displaying a TaskHeatmap component within a card layout to visualize task density and distribution.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfile.tsx: User profile page displaying worker information including name, skills, location, ratings, earnings, and recent tasks with icons and badges. Handles loading and no-profile states.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Notifications page listing all user notifications with mark-as-read functionality, unread badges, timestamps, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment failure page displaying an error message with a red X icon and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success page displaying a confirmation message with a green checkmark icon and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Displays a privacy policy page with GDPR-compliant content in Portuguese and English, covering data collection, usage, sharing, user rights, and security measures for the CanisterTask platform.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfile.tsx: Renders a public worker profile page showing user details, skills, location, pricing, and ratings, with error handling for invalid or missing profiles using Principal-based user identification.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Provides a settings page for managing browser notifications and user preferences, with permission handling and auto-refresh toggle functionality.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfService.tsx: Displays terms of service content in Portuguese and English, covering gig economy disclaimers, user obligations, payments, liability, and dispute resolution for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboard.tsx: Main worker dashboard showing available tasks, profile status, notifications, and test mode functionality with browser notifications, error handling, loading timeouts, and task simulation features.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography with Inter and Playfair Display fonts, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document defining a task marketplace platform with worker profiles, 7% platform fee system, earnings tracking, rating system, and admin capabilities for viewing all user profiles.
